tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conversation_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_conversations (
    conversation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    conversation_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conversation_logs (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_details (user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  subscription_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_content (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  content TEXT,
  type TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE keywords (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword TEXT,
  category TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    conversation_id UUID,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    conversation_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    engagement_score FLOAT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    content TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    date_created DATE
)
